      • getAt

        @Nonnull
public String getAt(@Nonnull
                             String key)
                      throws NoSuchMessageException
        Description copied from interface: GroovyAwareMessageSource
        Try to resolve the message.
        Specified by:
        getAt in interface GroovyAwareMessageSource
        Parameters:
        key - Key to lookup, such as 'log4j.appenders.console'
        Returns:
        The resolved message at the given key for the default locale
        Throws:
        NoSuchMessageException - if no message is found

      • getAt

        @Nonnull
public String getAt(@Nonnull
                             List<?> keyAndArgs)
                      throws NoSuchMessageException
        Description copied from interface: GroovyAwareMessageSource
        Try to resolve the message.
        Specified by:
        getAt in interface GroovyAwareMessageSource
        Parameters:
        keyAndArgs - Key to lookup, such as 'log4j.appenders.console' and arguments that will be filled in for params within the message (params look like "{0}" within a message, but this might differ between implementations), or null if none.
        Returns:
        The resolved message at the given key for the default locale
        Throws:
        NoSuchMessageException - if no message is found
